price: Lalle ne, waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni kuma suka aikata ayyuka na ƙwarai, Aljannar Firdausi ta kasance ita ce liyãfa a gare su.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسِ نُزُلًا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti kānat lahum jannātu al-fir'dawsi nuzulan
